Providence.Scholze\u2013Sayles House: The Scholze–Sayles House is an historic house at 625 East Avenue in Pawtucket, Rhode Island. It is a 1-1/2 story wood frame structure, built in 1874-75. It is one of two (the other is the nearby Louis Kotzow House) built by the German Land Cooperative Association, which sought to create a German-speaking enclave in the area.
